channel.title: [PI] Barrows armour & something else
channel.description:
I want to have it so when any barrows armour drops it doesnt go to e.g ahrims staff 0. I've tried searching for it but I couldn't find it anywere >.>.
EDIT:
Can someone maybe post a PI ::item command? I fucked mine up and I have no clue what's wrong.
